frame.name: The Based Oracle
frame.subtitle: Onchain prophecies for degens & builders
frame.description: Astrology for people who ship. Get your destiny forecast, written like Jesse Pollak met a zodiac prophet in a smart contract. Your onchain destiny, written in the blocks.

frame.ogTitle: The Based Oracle - Your Builder Destiny
frame.ogDescription: Your onchain destiny, written in the blocks. Stay based. Stay cosmic.
